data.name: Traditional upholstered sofa
data.description: A classic fabric sofa with a traditional design. It is perfect for dining rooms, living rooms, or even as an accent piece. The sturdy construction ensures durability and longevity, making it a great investment for your home. Pale greed pattern fabric with a dark wood frame.

data.name: Sleek modern fabric bed
data.description: Ultra modern loft style bed with a sleek design. It is perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, or even as an accent piece. Thin metal frame with orange fabric upholstery.

data.name: Luxury Traditional Bed
data.description: This bed features a luxurious, traditional European design with richly tufted golden-brown leather upholstery on both the headboard and footboard, framed by ornate wood carvings in a polished medium-brown finish. The curved shapes and intricate floral motifs reflect Baroque or Rococo influences, evoking a sense of opulence and classic elegance. Ideal for a master bedroom with vintage or classical decor, the bed combines plush comfort with high-end craftsmanship for a regal, timeless look.
